home.title: Daniel Heim
home.subtitle: Software Engineer Extraordinaire
home.desc: I am an experienced developer with a passion for crafting elegant solutions and engaging experiences.

about.title: Who I am
about.desc: I am a software engineer with a passion for creating awesome things. I have experience with a wide range of technologies, including game development, mobile development, and web development.

items.title: Game Development
items.desc: I have experience with game development, including Unity3D, C#, and JavaScript.

items.title: Mobile Development
items.desc: I have experience with both native (Android, iOS) and hybrid mobile (Xamarin, React Native) development.

items.title: Web Development
items.desc: I have experience with a wide range of web technologies, including the latest in HTML, CSS and JavaScript/Typescript.
